#Text=Become an Avon Consultant
#Text=Becoming an Avon consultant will give you the opportunity to promote and sell Avon products to individuals in your local area and everywhere else in your country .
#Text=As an Avon consultant , you can connect with people to sell product face-to-face , or sell Avon products on your own personal blog or website .
#Text=To become an Avon consultant , you are required to sign up for the sales program with another Avon consultant in your area , or online at Avon 's website .
#Text=After you have paid the applicable registration fees and received training materials , you can begin selling Avon product and start earning commission on sales .
#Text=Continue reading this article to learn more about the steps you must take to become an Avon consultant .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Sign Up Process
#Text=Find a local Avon consultant in your area .
#Text=To find an Avon consultant , you can either call Avon 's customer service center at 1-800-367-2866 , or email Avon at " dearavon [ at ] avon.com. "
#Text=Sign up online to become an Avon consultant .
#Text=You should only apply for the consultant program online if you cannot locate another Avon consultant in your local area .
#Text=Go to the " Your Avon " website displayed in the Sources section of this article , then click " Apply Now . "

column1: #Text=Type your personal information into the fields provided , then click on " Submit . "
#Text=The nearest Avon consultant in your region will contact you and provide you with the next steps for becoming a consultant .
#Text=Registration Process
#Text=Arrange a meeting with your local Avon consultant .
#Text=To fully register for the consultant program , you must meet with another Avon consultant to complete paperwork and discuss the program in more detail .
#Text=Ask the Avon consultant about the materials you should bring to the meeting ; such as identification , and registration fees .
#Text=The fees for becoming an Avon consultant will vary depending on the region and country in which you live .
#Text=Fill out the Avon consultant paperwork .
#Text=During your meeting with the local Avon consultant , you will be provided with the necessary registration paperwork for becoming a consultant .
#Text=Speak with the Avon consultant about any questions or concerns you have about the program .
#Text=The Avon consultant will address your concerns , and answer any questions you have about the consultant program in its entirety .
#Text=Start Selling Avon Products
#Text=Receive your first Avon kit in the mail .
#Text=After meeting with the local Avon consultant , your registration paperwork will be sent to the Avon office for processing .
#Text=After you have been accepted into the program , you will be sent an Avon kit with brochures , training materials , and various Avon product samples .
#Text=Determine how you want to sell Avon products .

#Text=As an Avon consultant , you can sell Avon products using any method you choose ; including hosting Avon parties , selling Avon products online , distributing brochures throughout your local community , and more .
#Text=Review the Avon training materials and resources to find additional tips and strategies for getting started with selling Avon products .
#Text=For example , if you want to sell Avon on the Internet , consult with your training materials to learn when you can attend an Avon training course for selling products online .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Network with and recruit other Avon consultants in your area .
#Text=By meeting with other Avon consultants , you can share sales tips and best practices ;
#Text=plus , you can potentially earn extra commission if you recruit new Avon consultants .
#Text=Use social media outlets for help with promoting and selling Avon products .

#Text=For example , if you use Facebook to socialize with friends and family , place an Avon widget on your Facebook page that allows your friends and family to purchase Avon products from you online .
#Text=Sell Avon products using more than one sales method to boost your income potential .

#Text=For example , if you enjoy using Avon products yourself , start a personal blog that features reviews on various Avon products , then publish links on the blog that drive visitors to your Avon sales page .
